creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: abstract image; black L-shaped borders at top and right; black square in LLC with a white rectangle with Japanese characters in light pencil over right side; central lozenge form with purple and pale green wavy edges; grayish interior with vertical wavy lines in peach; two black squares at left and right sides of lozenge; three other geometric forms; drawn on scratch paper--typewritten text showing through from verso; "44 x 2" in blue ink in LRQ
medium: Colored pencil, graphite pencil, and ink on paper
title: Untitled
